Accommodations

IEEE VR 2024: The 31st IEEE Conference on Virtual Reality and 3D User Interfaces
March 16-21, 2024 | Orlando, Florida USA

The conference will be held at the Contemporary Resort at Walt Disney World (WDW) in Orlando, Florida. We have arranged special room rates at both the Contemporary Resort (the conference hotel) and Disney’s Coronado Springs Resort as described below.

Availability at the Contemporary Resort and Coronado Springs Resort is limited. A link to the IEEE VR Booking Web Site will be provided with each confirmed conference registration.

The recommendations below include Disney resorts, non-Disney hotels on WDW property, and non-Disney hotels in the Disney Springs area. Other hotels further from the conference, e.g., across Interstate 4 (I-4), may be available at more affordable rates, and many of the hotels provide transit to the Disney parks as well as the airport.

In general, we recommend hotels on WDW property for convenience, or hotels in the Disney Springs area for cost and nearby amenities. For example, Disney Springs, which is within walking distance of multiple hotels, offers dining, shopping, and entertainment, and does not require an admission ticket. In addition, buses run from the Disney Springs bus depot directly to the contemporary resort.

Area Map

Google Maps Points of Interest

Hotels with Conference Negotiated Rates

Disney’s Contemporary Resort (Conference Hotel):

Conference Rate: $339/night. There is limited availability at this rate. A link to the IEEE VR Booking Web Site will be provided with each confirmed conference registration.

Disney’s Contemporary Resort Website

Disney’s Coronado Springs Resort (#1 on map above):

Conference Rate: $229/night. There is limited availability at this rate. A link to the IEEE VR Booking Web Site will be provided with each confirmed conference registration.

Disney’s Coronado Springs Resort Website

Other Disney Resort Hotels

These hotels include bus transportation to the Magic Kingdom, which is a 0.3 mile (0.5 km) walk along a sidewalk to the Contemporary Resort. Alternatively, one can take a bus to the Disney Transportation and Ticket Center and take a monorail directly to the Contemporary Resort. The buses usually take between 20 and 35 minutes, depending on the time of day — there is more likely a wait at opening and close. Lyft also offers a “Minivan” service in the resort area for those looking for alternative ride-share transit. All include on-premises restaurants and are good options for those intending to visit Disney parks during your stay.

The room rates and availability are subject to change at the time of booking.

  1. Disney’s Pop Century Resort
    Price Range: $230-250/night (as of 18 DEC 2023)
  2. Disney’s All-Star Movies (or Sports) Resort
    Price Range: $170-$200/night (as of 18 DEC 2023)

ADA Compliant Disney Resort Hotel Rooms
To book an ADA compliant Disney hotel room call +1 407-939-4686, identify yourself as an IEEE VR conference attendee, and let the agent know you want an ADA compliant room. The agent will ask about the amenities you need and try to find a room based on that information.

Disney Springs Area Hotels (Non-Disney)

These hotels are near the Disney Springs area, which includes transportation to the Contemporary resort and restaurants/shopping without requiring a Disney park ticket. Busses depart the Disney Springs Bus Depot (A on the map) for the Contemporary (conference location) every 20 minutes, but only starting at 9 am. Getting to the conference venue earlier may require a taxi or rideshare. In general, better deals can be found through third-party booking services such as Priceline or Expedia.

The room rates and availability are subject to change at the time of booking.

5–15 Minute Walk to Disney Springs (Buses to Conference)

  1. Wyndham Lake Buena Vista Disney Springs Resort Area
    Price Range: $204/night, Expedia and others $165/night
    Location: 1850 Hotel Plaza Blvd, Lake Buena Vista, FL 32830
  2. Holiday Inn Orlando-Disney Springs® Area, an IHG Hotel
    Price Range: $153-204/night
    Location: 1805 Hotel Plaza Blvd, Lake Buena Vista, FL 32830
  3. DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Orlando - Disney Springs™ Area
    Price Range: $189-$205/night
    Location: 2305 Hotel Plaza Blvd, Lake Buena Vista, FL 32830

30+ Minute Walk / 6 Minute Drive to Disney Springs (Buses to Conference)

  1. Courtyard by Marriott Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the Marriott Village
    Price Range: $110-140/night
    Location: 8623 Vineland Ave, Orlando, FL 32821-6499
  2. Rosen Inn Lake Buena Vista
    Price Range: $110-120/night
    Location: 8442 Palm Pkwy, Orlando, FL 32836-6413
  3. Grand Beach
    Price Range: $90-110/night
    Location: 8317 Lake Bryan Beach Blvd, Orlando, FL 32821-6312
